item.title: Benchmarking Code Review SLAs
item.description: Have you ever wondered if your teams code reviews are in line with industry standards? Do you sometimes not know if you’re going at a good pace or behind? Having a solid reference to benchmark against can be helpful so I’ve gone ahead and done some research and summarized key findings here that I thought might be useful to reference and ponder on. Review Frequency and Speed Google Median 4 MRs per week [1] 80 % reviewers review < 10 MRâ€™s per week [1] Time to get initial Initial feedback on an MR/PR: Google
